meanings.definition: To come into sight or view.
meanings.sent1: The sun appeared from behind the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit suddenly appeared in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was that the rabbit appeared out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: Hope appeared on the horizon like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The stars appeared in the night sky, twinkling brightly.

meanings.definition: To be published or made available.
meanings.sent1: The new book appeared on the shelves of the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The latest issue of the magazine appeared in mailboxes today.
meanings.sent3: The recipe for the delicious cake appeared in the cooking magazine.
meanings.sent4: The breaking news appeared on the front page of the newspaper.
meanings.sent5: The movie trailer appeared online, generating excitement among fans.

meanings.definition: To seem or give the impression of being.
meanings.sent1: She appeared tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: The old house appeared haunted with its dark windows.
meanings.sent3: The cat appeared to be plotting something mischievous.
meanings.sent4: His smile appeared genuine, showing his true happiness.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure appeared to be watching from a distance.
